de.comroid.vban

Class VBAN

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.comroid.vban.VBAN

  • public final class VBAN
extends Object
    Facade class for interacting with the API.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • openAudioOutputStream

        public static VBANOutputStream<AudioFrame> openAudioOutputStream(int port)
                                                          throws SocketException
        Opens a new audio sending stream that uses the default packet factory for the audio protocol and defaults to the loopback address.
        Parameters:
        port - The port to bind to.
        Returns:
        A new audio sender stream.
        Throws:
        SocketException - See DatagramSocket constructor.
